import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Container, AppBar, Typography, Grow, Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import memories from './images/memories.png' import { getPosts } from './actions/posts' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import Form from './components/Form/Form' import Posts from './components/Posts/Posts' import useStyles from './styles' export const App = () => { const [currentId, setCurrentId] = useState(null) const dispatch = useDispatch() const classes=useStyles() useEffect( () => { dispatch(getPosts()) }, [ currentId ,dispatch] ) return ( Memories
) } export default App;
